greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of longest palindromic subword of (n base 3).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) <= min(a(3*n), a(3*n+1), a(3*n+2)). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 31 2011]
maple: LPS:= proc(L) local nL, n, i;
for n from nL to 1 by -1 do
for i from 1 to nL-n+1 do
if L[i..i+n-1] = ListTools:-Reverse(L[i..i+n-1]) then return n fi
seq(LPS(convert(n, base, 3)), n=1..100); # Robert Israel, Dec 17 2020
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
